talk.author: did:plc:lw7mjy5hpanezorkk6jgw2mj
talk.utter: That ship sailed, you missed the final boarding call. AI will be used to misinform the crowds big time. The USA is doomed. The only chance to restore democracy and freedom is when the military steps in to defend the constitution and the flag. The people themselves have killed the last opportunity.

talk.author: did:plc:wgo5ar33e4mxa2ijlo676cy5
talk.utter:
Do you see AI here?

Stop giving up. Giving in to despair is what they want.

Tump BARELY won. Kamala BARELY lost.

She has beaten Trump's 2020 numbers. She has the 3rd highest vote total ever.

The House and Senate barely tilt towards the Rs. Dems won State Legs.

We can fight back.

talk.author: did:plc:lw7mjy5hpanezorkk6jgw2mj
talk.utter: Are you that naiv? Still believe you get a fair chance on democracy with new elections 4 years from now? The USA has taken the wrong road and there is no turning back, no escape route. Look at China, Russia and all the other countries led by one party. The republicans will reform constitution.

talk.author: did:plc:lw7mjy5hpanezorkk6jgw2mj
talk.utter: Are you that naiv? Still believe you get a fair chance on democracy with new elections 4 years from now? The USA has taken the wrong road and there is no turning back, no escape route. Look at China, Russia and all the other countries led by one party. The republicans will reform constitution.

talk.author: did:plc:wgo5ar33e4mxa2ijlo676cy5
talk.utter:
We have elections every year in this nation.

Each election Democrats can put more people in office and wrestle control locally, state, and nationally away from the MAGAts.

The Republicans do not have the votes to reform the constitution. They lack state trifectas to do it.

talk.author: did:plc:lw7mjy5hpanezorkk6jgw2mj
talk.utter: We'll just have to find out, but to me the most likely scenario is a copy of the Russian ending of democracy when Putin got elected. Watch how the press are being manipulated, and already Musk has named and blamed people of public services.

talk.author: did:plc:wgo5ar33e4mxa2ijlo676cy5
talk.utter:
Look at the 2024 election results.

Minus Trump & a few MAGAts his party lost.

Even with Trump on the ballot there was no red wave.

There was red tides in certain areas because white Hispanics & lefty idiots voted for fascism over the black lady, but that's about it.

Democrats were NOT wiped out.

talk.author: did:plc:lw7mjy5hpanezorkk6jgw2mj
talk.utter: Even if it is a small majority, the democrates lost all power and will never get the chance to get that back. Look what damage Brexit did. A small majority voted to leave the EU, now they have no economic or social benefits from that step, left out because they walked out without a way back.

You cannot compare Brexit to this.

Do you honestly think those egomaniacs in the Trump Admin are not going to destroy each other?

Remember 2023 and the Speaker fight? That is going to happen again.

In order to pass laws, the House is going to have to make deals with the Democrats.
